title: Wildlife In Miami
abstract: Miami offers a vibrant mix of wildlife, from exotic birds to marine life. Whether you're visiting the wetlands or exploring the coastline, Miami provides many opportunities to experience nature up close. Explore habitats, learn about conservation, and encounter species unique to the region.

services.title: Guided Wildlife Tours
services.intro: Explore Miami's diverse ecosystems with an expert guide. Perfect for animal enthusiasts looking to learn about the unique species in the region.

services.title: Wildlife Photography Workshops
services.intro: Join a professional photographer to capture Miami's beautiful wildlife in its natural habitat.

services.title: Wildlife Rescue and Rehabilitation Centers
services.intro: Visit centers that are focused on the conservation and rehabilitation of endangered species native to South Florida.

services.title: Boat Tours for Marine Life Spotting
services.intro: Take a boat ride through Miamiâ€™s waters to see dolphins, manatees, and other marine life.
list: Snorkeling trips for marine wildlife viewings

packages.description: Enjoy a guided snorkeling trip to observe underwater wildlife.
